title: Rafters - attitude toward the past and future

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Brewton uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitude toward the past and future.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Brewton uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitude toward the past and future.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
